article:
'Built NY, Inc.', also known as 'BUILT', is a design company based in New York
Cityâs SoHo neighborhood. BUILT produces bags, totes, and cases for tech
products and food and drink items. Founded in 2003 by Carter Weiss, Aaron Lown
and John Roscoe Swartz, [http://www.businessweek.com/innovate/content/feb20-
06/id20060209_065935.htm Business Week] the privately held company
[http://www.nytimes.com/2006/01/05/business/05sbiz.html The 'Build a Better
Mousetrap' Path to Growth - New York Times ] is
best known for its use of neoprene
[http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=6588706 Gadget Design
Gurus Pick for Grating and Wine : NPR ] (aka
the wetsuit material) and its award-winning product designs. BUILT received the
Gold award at Business Weekâs International Design Excellence Awards in 2004 and
2005 for its Two Bottle Tote [http://www.builtny.com/two-bottle-tote-
prod.html Two Bottle Tote ] and Lunch Tote
designs respectively. [http://www.nfib.com/business-resources/business-resources-
item?cmsid=32281 growth gone wild] Despite the name, the company's
products are manufactured primarily in China. [http://www.builtny.com/faqs-
cat.html], archived at [http://www.webcitation.org/6BiJ41wyI]
categories: Companies based in New York City
Online retail companies of the United States
Sporting goods retailers of the United States
